fork_status_and_schedule.highlight: Mainnet Shadow Fork 1 launched with BPO1 (15 max blobs) and BPO2 (21 max blobs); near 100% participation over 24 hours
Fusaka mainnet activation in a few days; Nethermind planning livestream

client_updates.highlight: Nimbus 25.11.0 running on MSF-1; 25.11.1 release in progress to fix supernode bug
ePBS Prysm PRs passing spec tests, awaiting merge to develop; Teku merging to master
Lodestar targeting January for ePBS devnets; Lighthouse making steady progress for late Dec/early Jan

testing_progress.highlight: Block-level access lists: 3 clients passing tests, DevNet launch imminent after Kurtosis testing

organizational.highlight: Trustless payments discussion flagged for ePBS breakout call December 5th due to community contention
FOCIL SFI vs CFI for Heka debate

action_items.action: Fill out incident response coordinators in Fusaka mainnet plan
Vet that proposal lookahead works correctly across forks for EIP-8045
Reach out to Etan re: EIP-7688 complexity assessment for next call

decisions.decision: DFI FOCIL (7805) for Glamsterdam; CFI for Heka. Take SFI discussion to ACDE.
DFI 8071 (consolidation withdrawal prevention); will CFI either 8061 or 8080 next call
DFI 8062 (0x01 sweep fee) for Glamsterdam - debate on impact, timing, UX improvements needed first
CFI 8045 (exclude slashed proposers) pending verification of proposal lookahead safety
7688 (stable containers) deferred to next call; lean towards inclusion pending complexity review

targets.target: December 5th - ePBS breakout call for trustless payments discussion
